alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 17 at 2:19PM EST until November 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 feet in the most persistent lake snows. The greatest risk of the highest totals will be from South Buffalo to Lancaster. The heaviest snow is expected late this evening through Friday night when snowfall rates could exceed 3 inches per hour. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce patchy blowing snow. * WHERE...Northern Erie and Genesee counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning and evening commutes. The heavy snow could also bring down some tree limbs and cause scattered power outages. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4287 7829 4306 7823 4313 7848 4304 7901 4298 7902 4288 7889 4281 7890 4249 7945 4248 7937 4264 7869 TIME Y22M11D18T0000Z-Y22M11D18T0600Z COORD...4286 7817 4299 7815 4306 7823 4306 7853 4299 7895 4279 7890 4249 7945 4247 7943 4273 7848 4276 7831 TIME Y22M11D18T0600Z-Y22M11D18T1200Z COORD...4296 7809 4308 7826 4308 7870 4298 7902 4279 7890 4237 7965 4237 7956 4256 7906 4268 7859 4278 7834 TIME Y22M11D18T1200Z-Y22M11D19T1200Z COORD...4320 7854 4329 7867 4330 7879 4326 7900 4322 7906 4307 7909 4293 7897 4290 7884 4297 7869 4307 7859 TIME Y22M11D19T1200Z-Y22M11D20T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
